metadata.name: HackTool - Mimikatz Execution
metadata.comment: Detection well-known mimikatz command line arguments

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dumpcreds')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('mimikatz')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('::aadcookie')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('::detours')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('::memssp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('::mflt')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('::ncroutemon')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('::ngcsign')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('::printnightmare')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('::skeleton')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('::preshutdown')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('::mstsc')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('::multirdp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('rpc::')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('token::')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('crypto::')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dpapi::')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sekurlsa::')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('kerberos::')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('lsadump::')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('privilege::')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('process::')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('vault::'))))

output.summary: Detection well-known mimikatz command line arguments
